entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Kitchener-Waterloo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:49 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Region of Waterloo Int'l Airport 5:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -2.4°C
Pressure: 102.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -7.0°C
Wind: W 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
